info.name: Modern Steam UI for STS
info.description: Modern Steam UI Style for Steam Translation Server Compatible with STS Helper userscript Click Here for More Screenshots Also, check out my Flat Design for STS style: Here Contact me on: Steam
info.additionalInfo: Latest changes: October 15th, 2020 - - Updated image URLs for apps on STS. You can now choose from 4 User Image corner styles: Steam Square(Default), Squircle, Square, and Rounded; And options to keep the old STS fonts Or replace them with Motiva Sans/Arial/Helvetica families and to choose translate.php page theme between Light(Default) and Dark. What's new: - Modern Steam UI themed of the entire STS web pages. - Move navigation bar to be fixed on the top of web pages. - Option to change default fonts to Motiva Sans family for Latin and Sarabun family for Thai. - Change color scheme to looks more modern. - New styles for inputs, buttons, anchors, and etc. - Icons for the Most Outdated and Untranslated string lists. and much more. (Special thanks to Manfre for the old source code)
